name: Building Alien Invasion Houses
raw: 1) Regular Building Structure ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Generic Volatile Nanobots" "247760" #L "HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate" "202540" #L "Generic Organic Immunity System" "254822" #L "Blueprint - Regular Building Structure" "247768" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Generic Volatile Nanobots + HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate = #L "Strong Regenerating Bioplate" "247757" Skills: | CH | ------------------------------ Generic Organic Immunity System + Strong Regenerating Bioplate = #L "Superior Bioplate" "254806" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Blueprint - Regular Building Structure + Superior Bioplate = #L "Regular Building Structure" "254807" Skills: | ?? | 2) Build a Simple Structure ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Regular Building Structure" "254807" a Floorplan ( ie : #L "Floorplan - Omni-Tek Notum Silo" "255476" ) ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Floorplan + Regular Building Structure = a Stucture ( ie : #L "Omni-Tek Notum Silo" "254144" ) Skills: | ?? | 3) Build a HQ Structure ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Regular Building Structure" "254807" a HQ Floorplan ( ie : #L "Floorplan - Neutral Small Organization Headquarters" "254790" ) #L "Fertilized Giant Chirop Egg" "247788" #L "Unrefined Notum Salt" "247786" #L "Slow-Killing Poison" "247791" #L "Uncle Bazzit's Bio-Mechanical AI" "247794" #L "Advanced Bio-Comminutor" "154332" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Unrefined Notum Salt + Fertilized Giant Chirop Egg = #L "Mutating Giant Chirop Egg" "247789" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Slow-Killing Poison + Mutating Giant Chirop Egg = #L "Poisoned Giant Chirop Egg" "247790" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Bio-Comminutor + Poisoned Giant Chirop Egg = #L "Mutating Bio-Pulp" "247792" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Mutating Bio-Pulp + Uncle Bazzit's Bio-Mechanical AI = #L "Bio-Mechanical Computer" "247795" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Bio-Mechanical Computer + Regular Building Structure = #L "Superior Building Structure" "254829" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ HQ Floorplan + Superior Building Structure = a HQ Stucture ( ie : #L "Small Omni-Tek Organization Headquarters" "254210" ) Skills: | ?? | 4) Build High QL HQ Structure ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Kyr'Ozch Viral Serum" "254805" #L "Manteze Scout Nasal Membrane" "247762" #L "Advanced Bio-Comminutor" "154332" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Bio-Comminutor + Manteze Scout Nasal Membrane = #L "Membrane Pulp" "247763" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Membrane Pulp + Kyr'Ozch Viral Serum = #L "Generic Organic Immunity System" "254822" Skills: | ?? | Now, build a Regular Building Structure with this Generic Organic Immunity System which is of a higher QL than in shop. Then Build a high HQ with this Regular Building Structure. ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Worth all the messing around I think :)
